SELECT A.id AS woId, A.wo_code AS woCode, A.status AS woStatus, A.work_date AS workDate,
D.id AS lineId, D.line_name AS lineName,
SUM(W.planned_quantity) AS totalPlannedQuantity, COUNT(W.id) AS woiCount
FROM work_order A JOIN production_line D ON A.line_id = D.id JOIN work_order_item W ON W.work_order_id = A.id
WHERE A.work_date = #{date}
GROUP BY A.id, A.wo_code, A.status, A.work_date, D.id, D.line_name
ORDER BY D.line_name ASC, A.wo_code ASC
